From invigorating fitness classes and outdoor adventures to nourishing, healthy cuisine, every element is designed to leave you feeling refreshed and recharged. Tee off at the world-renowned Ria Bintan Golf Course, take on a beachfront Bootcamp, or unwind with yoga by the sea, followed by a cold-pressed juice. Families will find plenty to enjoy with activities for all ages, while the two-level beachside pool offers panoramic views of the South China Sea — the perfect spot to relax and soak in the island’s tranquillity. Easily accessible from Singapore via a short ferry ride, Club Med Bintan is your effortless gateway to tropical rejuvenation and unforgettable moments. Wellness Club Med Bintan offers wellness treatments at its Club Med Spa by Sothys which includes body treatments like exfoliation and aromatherapy, various massages such as Malay, Hawaiian, and Shiatsu, and facial therapies. Guests can also participate in fitness and mindfulness activities like yoga, Pilates, and Aqua fitness, with opportunities to enjoy healthy dining options and beachside relaxation.
